story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful islands of the Philippines, there lived a young boy named Miguel. Miguel was a brave and curious little boy who loved to explore the forests and beaches near his home.

One day, as the sun began to set, Miguel's mother called out to him, "Miguel, it's time for bed!" Miguel quickly ran inside their cozy bamboo hut, ready for his bedtime story.

His mother sat next to him and began to tell him a tale of magi​cal creatures that roamed the forests at night. She spoke of diwatas who danced under the moonlight, and tikbalangs who galloped through the fields.

Miguel's eyes grew wide with wonder as he imagined all these fantastic creatures. His mother's soothing voice filled the room, transporting him to a world of enchantment and adventure.

As the story came to an end, Miguel's mother kissed him on the forehead and tucked him into bed. "Goodnight, my dear boy. Sweet dreams," she whispered.

With a smile on his face, Miguel drifted off to sleep, his heart full of the magic and beauty of his mother's bedtime story. And as he slept, the stars outside twinkled brightly, watching over the peaceful village and its inhabitants, including the brave and curious young boy named Miguel.​ 

And so, dear mother, may your son always be filled with wonder and joy, and may his dreams be as enchanting as the stories you tell him. Goodnight.​
